Desc.entry: A group of ladies who meet to do craft work with their own materials. Crafts include: card making, parchment work, decoupage, knitting (charity and church projects). Members can bring their own craft work to do. Booking not necessary. Beginners welcome.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues 2-4pm (craft group); Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm; Tues, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (library opening hours)
